TopicTitle: The Spirit Of Destiny - Tribute to spiritworlf's Spirit of Kerbin

Articles.Content:
The Spirit Of Destiny - Tribute to spiritworlf's Spirit of Kerbin

So the spirit of destiny is a work in progress, It has 2 torpedos with rapier engines for speed, It can't get up to space without hyperedit (Expected ) There's no way to reload it yet, I'm not sure how I would but if you have suggestions PLEASE tell me them in a reply!

So here she is...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Tell me any suggestions, If you like the spirit of destiny, Especially how I could reload her...

And yeah this is a WIP so feedback is welcome.

Craft file probably to be released once shes done.

Thanks for reading!

[Changelog 1]

So the spirit of destiny has been very improved on, A lot has been done in such a short time.

I coulden't get a reload system, So she now has 2 sunbeam lazors and will have more as she evolves.

I coulden't explain it all even if I tried.
